description: Research completion messages with tech benefits

formatNotes.research_event_format: Research Complete Event is 7 bytes: 50 00 FE FF LL CF NF where 0x50=type, 0x00=flags, 0xFFFE='no planet' (research is global), LL=level, CF=completed field, NF=next research field
formatNotes.no_planet_marker: 0xFFFE (-2) in bytes 2-3 indicates 'no planet' since research is player-global. Production events have planet IDs at this position.
formatNotes.next_field: Byte 6 is the NEXT research field (where research will continue), not a validation repeat. In our samples field=nextField because players continued in same field.

researchEvents.description: Your scientists have completed research into Tech Level 4 for Biotechnology
Your scientists have completed research into Tech Level 5 for Biotechnology
Your scientists have completed research into Tech Level 6 for Biotechnology
